name: DLink | DxS_Cisco_CLI | Network | LBD | Loop Detected #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %RLDP-3-LINK_DETECT_ERROR: Detected loop detection error on interface TenGigabitEthernet 1/1.Set this interface errordisable.

patterns.value_re: %RLDP-3-LINK_DETECT_ERROR: Detected loop detection error on interface (?P<interface>.+)\.Set this interface errordisable.

name: DLink | DxS_Cisco_CLI | Network | LBD | Loop Cleared #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %RLDP-3-LINK_DETECT_RECOVER: Interface TenGigabitEthernet 1/1 recovered from loop error.

name: DLink | DxS_Cisco_CLI | Network | LBD | Loop Detected #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %LLDP-4-ERRDETECT: Port GigabitEthernet 0/13 detected loop, please check the network.

patterns.value_re: %LLDP-4-ERRDETECT: Port (?P<interface>.+) detected loop, please check the network
